'''Retrieve the Treasure''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during [[Klee]]'s [[Story Quest]] [[Trifolium Chapter]]: Act I - [[True Treasure]] quest "[[The Mystery of the Girl in Red's Treasure]]"

==Chests==
* Common Chest ×1 (behind two crates in a corner of the first staircase)
* Exquisite Chest ×1 (at the end of the first area, behind the breakable rock wall)
* Precious Chest ×1 (after clearing the domain)
